# Sponge Bath

This is an [Onsen Meguri](https://puzz.link/rules.html?onsen) with edges that identify with each other - the loop branches at and only at the points where it crosses an edge.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2023/spongeBath1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
